verses.name: 1 Chronicles 3:1
verses.text: Now these were the sons of David, which were born unto him in Hebron; the firstborn Amnon, of Ahinoam the Jezreelitess; the second Daniel, of Abigail the Carmelitess:

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 3:2
verses.text: The third, Absalom the son of Maachah the daughter of Talmai king of Geshur: the fourth, Adonijah the son of Haggith:

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 3:3
verses.text: The fifth, Shephatiah of Abital: the sixth, Ithream by Eglah his wife.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 3:4
verses.text: These six were born unto him in Hebron; and there he reigned seven years and six months: and in Jerusalem he reigned thirty and three years.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 3:5
verses.text: And these were born unto him in Jerusalem; Shimea, and Shobab, and Nathan, and Solomon, four, of Bath–shua the daughter of Ammiel:

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 3:6
verses.text: Ibhar also, and Elishama, and Eliphelet,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 3:7
verses.text: And Nogah, and Nepheg, and Japhia,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 3:8
verses.text: And Elishama, and Eliada, and Eliphelet, nine.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 3:9
verses.text: These were all the sons of David, beside the sons of the concubines, and Tamar their sister.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 3:10
verses.text: And Solomon’s son was Rehoboam, Abia his son, Asa his son, Jehoshaphat his son,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 3:11
verses.text: Joram his son, Ahaziah his son, Joash his son,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 3:12
verses.text: Amaziah his son, Azariah his son, Jotham his son,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 3:13
verses.text: Ahaz his son, Hezekiah his son, Manasseh his son,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 3:14
verses.text: Amon his son, Josiah his son.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 3:15
verses.text: And the sons of Josiah were, the firstborn Johanan, the second Jehoiakim, the third Zedekiah, the fourth Shallum.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 3:16
verses.text: And the sons of Jehoiakim: Jeconiah his son, Zedekiah his son.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 3:17
verses.text: And the sons of Jeconiah; Assir, Salathiel his son,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 3:18
verses.text: Malchiram also, and Pedaiah, and Shenazar, Jecamiah, Hoshama, and Nedabiah.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 3:19
verses.text: And the sons of Pedaiah were, Zerubbabel, and Shimei: and the sons of Zerubbabel; Meshullam, and Hananiah, and Shelomith their sister:

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 3:20
verses.text: And Hashubah, and Ohel, and Berechiah, and Hasadiah, Jushab–hesed, five.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 3:21
verses.text: And the sons of Hananiah; Pelatiah, and Jesaiah: the sons of Rephaiah, the sons of Arnan, the sons of Obadiah, the sons of Shechaniah.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 3:22
verses.text: And the sons of Shechaniah; Shemaiah: and the sons of Shemaiah; Hattush, and Igeal, and Bariah, and Neariah, and Shaphat, six.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 3:23
verses.text: And the sons of Neariah; Elioenai, and Hezekiah, and Azrikam, three.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 3:24
verses.text: And the sons of Elioenai were, Hodaiah, and Eliashib, and Pelaiah, and Akkub, and Johanan, and Dalaiah, and Anani, seven.
